snippet: LEVY--Lawrence, on June 18, 2016 at age 87. Survived by Toba Sherwood Levy, father of Ford (Cindy) Levy and Hope Levy. Grandfather of Kristen and Maxwell Levy and George Kaslow. Graveside service Monday, June 20 at 3:00pm, Beth David Cemetery Elmont, NY. 1/3
lead_paragraph: LEVY--Lawrence, on June 18, 2016 at age 87. Survived by Toba Sherwood Levy, father of Ford (Cindy) Levy and Hope Levy. Grandfather of Kristen and Maxwell Levy and George Kaslow. Graveside service Monday, June 20 at 3:00pm, Beth David Cemetery Elmont, NY. 1/3
